msg: YARN-593. container launch on Windows does not correctly populate classpath with new process's environment variables and localized resources (Chris Nauroth via bikas)

author: markt
msg: Forgot to create TreeSet with correct Comparator. Add a test case that checks the context starts correctly.
Also, TemplatePathMatchComparator is thread-safe so use a single instance rather than creating multiple instances.
